attributes.background: First of all adding some aircon would be nice. Secondly, it’s not every day delays, delays, delays. It’s an absolute shambles of a service and I am extremely disappointed and tired.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. Transport for London is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
